title: What makes a poem, the poem? - Quora

response.answer_text: Actually, every poet or poetess differ from each other. And everyone write according to them. Writing poem is a creative work. Poem is classified in two form - Rhyme poem- Rhyme poem is topic by great poet. Who are aware about aliteration, simile, rhyme etcFree poem - Free poem is topic by beginners. Who are only write, what He/she like to write. Either imagination or topic based.Every poem is thinking or imagination of poet. Great poet, whatever they are write in there poem. Nothing but beauty of there words /thoughts.A poem become the poem when beauty given to words /thoughts by poet. With creativity, which force to reader to read again and again.In simple way, the way which poem presented , does'nt matter what kind of topic choosen by poet. Makes a poem, the poem.

Well poem is all about deploying true emotions in subtle but relatable manner. To make a poem you will need following things MessageA channel to deliver the messageAn environment for that channel.For a change I ll explain my answer backwards. 3. An environment for the channel Well this is from where you start, you have to make an interesting start just to get the readers attention. It may be there even from the title itself. Here is where you deliver your first 2 stanzas. Ideally you can describe the scene, emotion or person. Trust me it's just like you have invited a friend to come over and you are showing your house to him/her. 2. Channel to deliver the message Since you have readers attention now play your cards wisely. Remember this mantra. Readers are always impatient. They loose interest quickly. You have to continuously surprise them, just to keep their attention. This is where your next 2 stanzas come into the picture. It's like pulling a string in order to release the arrow. You can try asking questions in this department. 1.The message. Since you have pulled the string long enough, now don't make them wait and just say it. Express your message. The most important part is it should be relatable enough to create an impact on users mind. In my personal opinion ideal length for a poem is 5 to 6 stanzas. Hope this helps you. Keep inking.
